00053   AcquisitionData(int acquisitionNumberInRun, 
00054                int acquisitionNumberInConfiguration)
00055     //int maxTimeOfAcquisitionsec,
00056     //int maxTimeOfAcquisitionmus) 
00057    {
00058       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqNumberRun, acquisitionNumberInRun);
00059       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqNumberConf, acquisitionNumberInConfiguration);
00060       //obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqMaxEvts, maxEventsInAcquisition);  
00061       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqEvtInfo, 0);  
00062       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqTimeInfSec, 0);  
00063       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqTimeInfMus, 0);  
00064       //obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqMaxTimesec, maxTimeOfAcquisitionsec);  
00065       //obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqMaxTimemus, maxTimeOfAcquisitionmus);  
00066       //DIF data 5/12/10
00067       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValHasDifInfo, 0);   
00068       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValDifTriggerCounter, 0);   
00069       obj()->setIntVal(kAcqDataIntValDifNdataBufferWords, 0);   
00070       }

00133    unsigned int getMaxEventNumberInAcquisition()  
00134     {
00135       if(!getAcquisitionState()) {
00136         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Asking max event number in acq for wrong state" << std::endl;
00137         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: State is Acquisition end" << std::endl;
00138         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Can only ask for actual event number" << std::endl;
00139         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Will return 0" << std::endl;
00140         return 0;
00141       }
00142 
00143      return static_cast<unsigned int>(obj()->getIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqEvtInfo));
00144    }
00145 
00148    unsigned int getActEventNumberInAcquisition()  
00149     {
00150       if(getAcquisitionState()) {
00151         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Asking act event number in acq for wrong state" << std::endl;
00152         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: State is Acquisition start" << std::endl;
00153         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Can only ask for maximal event number" << std::endl;
00154         std::cout << "Acquisition data - warning: Will return 0" << std::endl;
00155         return 0;
00156       }
00157 
00158      return static_cast<unsigned int>(obj()->getIntVal(kAcqDataIntValAcqEvtInfo));
00159    }
